content.text:
Yep! I'm [@regular](@nti4TWBH/WNZnfwEoSleF3bgagd63Z5yeEnmFIyq0KA=.ed25519) Yep! For example, with the plugin loaded you can do `sbot messagesByType test` and it'll include:

```json
{
  "key": "%SUB6xPT0IO2kAGIYamCAjWApx+TDzsCYotU+EZkPWNE=.sha256",
  "value": {
    "previous": "%g1EKY+3dh7hrlbMDT4qxbHwG4LKdIirzIEM5ZQVGeCQ=.sha256",
    "sequence": 6094,
    "author": "@+oaWWDs8g73EZFUMfW37R/ULtFEjwKN/DczvdYihjbU=.ed25519",
    "timestamp": 1539635412062,
    "hash": "sha256",
    "content": {
      "type": "test",
      "text": "replication test"
    },
    "signature": "VcjjTenq1RdOm61I9OodetAq7l3MA+nK6NhzrKKlEBmYCEov8RmM9zctgbs6OQ3jJ3NaZZYyBUMNBC2eGsifDg==.sig.ed25519",
    "blob": "&AEAblKqa71I3uySfqYxLScUgutPhajECXz2XjNpmiL4=.sha256",
    "blobContent": true
  },
  "timestamp": 1539635412064
}
```
